column1: '''Sadoc Brandybuck''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Sadoc was the son of [[Gormadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Malva Headstrong]]. He was born in {{SR
column2: 1179}}, the middle child, between his brothers [[Madoc Brandybuck
column4: Marroc]]. He has three children, of which the daughter, [[Salvia Brandybuck
